name: The Old West World (C64)
description:
The Old West World a Game for the C64Maxi/Mini or a Real C64 and of course a Good C64 Emulator (Vice, Etc).

1 Player Push Scroll Left shoot em up, Shoot the Baddies but save the Lady's by walking into Them.

Made and Works on Pal C64, Tested with Vice64 on NTSC it worked but Score and Lifes do not show on Screen.

Also has 2 Bonus D64 files inside the Bonus Folder in the Zip file, A Read Me File is included and will explain the 2 Bonus D64 files.

Made with the side ways Shoot 'Em' Up Construction Kit by Sensible Software and Jon Wells.
